bibl.title: Wojownicze bóstwo Bes. [The warrior deity Bes.]
bibl.note: The article is not only concerned with the iconographic genesis of the deity, but also presents his military configuration as one of the key elements in his iconographic development [in Ptolemaic and Roman times]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Sławomir Jędraszek, Wojownicze bóstwo Bes. [The warrior deity Bes.]
Scripta Biblica et Orientalia [Katolicki Uniwersytet Lubelski Jana Pawła II, Lublin] 4 (2012) pp. 145-177, 6 figg. n./bl. et coul.

The article is not only concerned with the iconographic genesis of the deity, but also presents his military configuration as one of the key elements in his iconographic development [in Ptolemaic and Roman times]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
